author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JiLin Sino-Microelectronics says change of accounting policy
text:
Feb 12(Reuters) - JiLin Sino-Microelectronics Co Ltd
* Says it changes accounting policy based on accounting standards for business enterprises No. 42â€”non-current assets and disposal groups held for sale and termination of business operation, which was disclosed by the Ministry of Finance on April 28, 2017, effective May 28, 2017
